1.12.2.2.12.5: Added TargetCrafting package and more Map package
1.12.2.2.11.22: Made Rect public, more useful Rect methods
1.12.2.2.11.20: Support for blockproperties and crop age in NameKeys.  Rare insta-expire fix, other fixes. Time init fix. CraftingUtil findPlayer and findWorld
1.12.2.2.11.13: Improved early server life timer functioning
1.12.2.2.11.12: Fix for ConcurrentModificationException due to ICopyableCap.copyTo()
1.12.2.2.10.7: Map functions and base mod class moved from Pantography. More ICopyableCap functionality. Reusable CapMergeRecipe from FoodFunk. Moved various classes.
1.12.2.2.9.2: ItemStack forceUpdate hack optional. BaseChest rendering rotatable.
1.12.2.2.8.28: EventTimedThingCap - timer on a thing that uses events rather than tick for checks
1.12.2.2.6.11: Bug fixes and additions to base capabilities and adapters.
1.12.2.2.6.0: nameKey OreDict (defauts true) and class names (defaults false) optional.  Added base capabilities.
1.12.2.2.4.0: Easy to use doesIt for MatchingConfig FALSE_VALUE
1.12.2.2.3.1: Easy to use doesIt for MatchingConfig FALSE_VALUE
1.12.2.2.3.0: MatchingConfig NameKey support for class names of ItemStacks and TileEntities, debug/test info for them
1.12.2.2.1.0: Added TimeUtil, container Walkers, TriConsumer, TriFunction.
